article: People all over the world celebrate Valentine's Day.However, the holiday  is celebrated  differently in different countries  _  each culture has its own Valentine's Day customs. For example,people in the United States and Japan both celebrate Valentine's Day  _  February 14.But in Japan,only romantic partners come together,while in America,it can be shared by anyone  _  is close,friend or lover.Chocolate is the most preferred gift in the US  _  it is common in Japan,too.However,in the US other kinds of gifts are  _  given,and many people exchange cards. The biggest  _  is that in Japan,only girls and women.  give  chocolates to boys and men,but in the US boys and girls will give cards or small gifts to all of  _  friends.And while American men and women both receive gifts,women usually get  _  expensive gifts than men.That's why I would like to be a man in Japan but a woman in the US!
